text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Breaking news

Inside the WHITE HOUSE, IMPOTUS's strategy is to  HAPPY TALK that the cure for coronavirus is just around the corner. 

He believes voters are dumb enough to fall for it and re-elect him.

He thinks he knows how Americans can be SUCKERED! https://t.co/lTHR5rjCqu
